io.appium.droiddriver.actions.view

Class CloseKeyboardAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.appium.droiddriver.actions.BaseAction
      • io.appium.droiddriver.actions.view.ViewAction
        • io.appium.droiddriver.actions.view.CloseKeyboardAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action

    public class CloseKeyboardAction
extends ViewAction
    Closes soft keyboard. Based on the Espresso code under the same name.
